original_text: But let people and animals be covered with sackcloth. Let everyone call urgently on God. Let them give up their evil ways and their violence.
korean_text: 사람이든지 짐승이든지 다 굵은 베 옷을 입을 것이요 힘써 하나님께 부르짖을 것이며 각기 악한 길과 손으로 행한 강포에서 떠날 것이라

sentences.original_text: But let people and animals be covered with sackcloth
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 사람들과 짐승들이 굵은 베옷을 덮입게 하라

sentences.original_text: Let everyone call urgently on God
Let them give up their evil ways
